snippet.title: Sister Ray - Reveal Trailer
snippet.description:
WISHLIST: https://store.steampowered.com/app/3200290

Sister Ray is an RPG-survival about the brutal daily life of a drug addicted artist named Ray, who takes care of her little sister. Look after your condition, so no one finds out about the addiction. Improve your drawing and social skills. Do everything to get cash for another fix. Survive and look for a way out.

You'll find links to our social media in the pinned comment.

Liquid light show:  https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=nK4oWwEYiQs

#sisterray #indiegame #indie #indiegames #addict #drugaddition #art #trailer #unity #rpg #rpggames #survival #survivalgame
